custom_commands.name: update-claude-docs
custom_commands.description: Update all CLAUDE documentation based on recent code changes
custom_commands.prompt:
Please perform a comprehensive documentation update:

1. First, analyze recent changes:
   - Check the last 10 git commits for code changes
   - Identify modified files and their types
   - Note any new features, commands, or configurations

2. Update the appropriate CLAUDE documentation:
   - CLAUDE.md: Update architecture, commands, and guidelines if core functionality changed
   - CLAUDE-TECHNICAL.md: Update if dependencies, Docker, or technical specs changed
   - CLAUDE-OPERATIONS.md: Update if operational procedures or troubleshooting changed
   - CLAUDE-SETUP.md: Update if setup steps, environment variables, or prerequisites changed

3. For each update:
   - Maintain existing formatting and style
   - Update examples to match current code
   - Fix any broken file paths or references
   - Update version numbers and dates

4. Validate all changes:
   - Ensure cross-references between docs work
   - Verify command syntax is correct
   - Check that file paths exist
   - Confirm configuration examples are accurate

Please show me what changes you're making and why.

quick.prompt_modifier: Focus only on sections directly affected by recent changes.

full.prompt_modifier: Perform a complete review of all documentation, checking for any outdated information.

validate.prompt_modifier: Don't make changes yet, just report what needs updating.

custom_commands.name: check-code-quality
custom_commands.description: Run the comprehensive code review checklist
custom_commands.prompt: Please run the comprehensive code review checklist from CLAUDE.md on the recent changes. Check all 6 levels and provide the review output in the specified format.

custom_commands.name: explain-architecture
custom_commands.description: Explain a specific part of the system architecture
custom_commands.prompt: Please explain the architecture and implementation details of the specified component, referencing the CLAUDE documentation for context.

custom_commands.name: troubleshoot
custom_commands.description: Help troubleshoot an issue using CLAUDE-OPERATIONS.md
custom_commands.prompt: Please help troubleshoot this issue using the procedures in CLAUDE-OPERATIONS.md. Provide step-by-step debugging instructions.

custom_commands.name: setup-help
custom_commands.prompt: Please provide setup assistance using CLAUDE-SETUP.md as reference. Guide me through the required steps.
